text: Alto Recorder by Thomas Stanesby, Jr.(mid-18th century, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, London. Thomas Stanesby Sr. (c.1668 – 1734) and Thomas Stanesby Jr (1692 – 1754) were English oboe, flute and recorder-makers of the 18th century. Many of their instruments survive in museum collections around the world, and are widely copied by instrument makers of the present day. Category:English musical instrument makers Category:Duos Category:18th-century English people Category:Recorder makers Category:Flute makers Category:Oboe makers
title: Thomas Stanesby
